text: The Paraguayan Football Association (; APF) is the governing body of football in Paraguay. The association organizes the Paraguayan football league, the Paraguay national futsal team and the Paraguay national football team. It is based in Luque. The APF was founded in 1906. It became a member of CONMEBOL in 1921 and FIFA in 1925. title: Paraguayan Football Association
